description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1tju6","text":"This protocol is a general automated pipeline to prepare mastermix at the plate level in a sterile way. The protocol volumes can be edited, as can sample numbers, to change the scale of the operation and optimise it to fit any end-point PCR. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9c911","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mm76","text":"This protocol was developed and optimised for the following:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"faetk","text":"Platform: Opentrons OT-2 automated pipetting robot","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3n9b8","text":"Tested with software version 6.3.1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k1ou","text":" ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6t5rq","text":"Tips Used: 1 box and 1 column of 20uL filtered Opentrons Tips","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ag70v","text":"Number of samples: 91 samples and 5 controls in a 96 well plate ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fer5u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evrut","text":"Important: In an ideal situation, there would be two OT-2 robots involved in this process: the first to prepare sterile reagents and make and aliquot the mastermix, and the second to add the template. In the absence of this facility, we have developed a means of keeping each ingredient on the deck singly, rather than having all ingredients open on the deck at once. So please take note of the protocol pauses in built to replace each ingredient with the next. In this way, no two ingredients are open inside the OT2 hood at the same time. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vdsp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ah9qv","text":"Python File Version 2.2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4gov","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbi4l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":1,"cas_number":"","concentration":"10","entries":null,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"437629DB341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","id":0,"label":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"GoTaq G2 Hot Start Green Master Mix","public":0,"rrid":"","scientificNotation":false,"sku":"M742B","unit":29,"url":"https://worldwide.promega.com/products/pcr/taq-polymerase/gotaq-g2-hot-start-master-mixes/?catNum=M7423#specifications","vendor":{"id":23,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.promega.com","name":"Promega"}}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"9m9j3","text":"Step 1: Please note we use a particular Taq but you can alter this to suit your needs. You can also edit your PCR mix recipe by following the template in this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blr5g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91unm","text":"Step 5: Import the labware file BEFORE you import your protocol or it will give an error. A skirted plate will clip into the deck, and a non-skirted plate or strip tubes will need support (and the labware definition file attached to this protocol). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lotf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s7q4","text":"Step 12: Note that we have specific wells in which we load controls, and for this you will need to remove the tips from the box so no template is added accidentally.
